statements: SELECT * FROM car_maintenance_history
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM car_maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT maintenance_type, cost, maintenance_date FROM car_maintenance_history ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT * FROM car_maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%oil%'
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost, MAX(cost) AS max_cost, MIN(cost) AS min_cost FROM car_maintenance_history
SELECT * FROM car_maintenance_history ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, cost ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM car_maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type LIKE 'Oil%'
SELECT * FROM car_maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT car_id, maintenance_description FROM car_maintenance_history ORDER BY car_id ASC
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM car_maintenance_history
SELECT car_model FROM car_data WHERE mileage > 50000;
SELECT * FROM car_data WHERE coolant_level < 20;
SELECT car_model, engine_temperature FROM car_data WHERE engine_temperature > 90 ORDER BY engine_temperature DESC;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM car_data WHERE mileage > 50000 AND oil_pressure < 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT car_model, engine_temperature FROM car_data WHERE coolant_level <= 50 ORDER BY car_model ASC;
SELECT car_model, mileage FROM car_data WHERE coolant_level > 70 AND oil_pressure > 30 ORDER BY mileage DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT car_model, maintenance_type FROM car_data JOIN maintenance_logs ON car_data.id = maintenance_logs.car_id WHERE maintenance_cost >= 500 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT car_model, timestamp FROM car_data WHERE engine_temperature BETWEEN 90 AND 100 AND coolant_level < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM CarData;
SELECT model, year FROM CarData WHERE year >= 2010;
SELECT car_id, last_maintenance_date FROM CarData ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, mechanic_name FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM SensorsData WHERE car_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CarData WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT car_id, model, year, mileage FROM CarData WHERE mileage < 50000 ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT car_id, model, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, mechanic_name FROM CarData JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON CarData.car_id = MaintenanceRecords.car_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT car_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM CarData JOIN SensorsData ON CarData.car_id = SensorsData.car_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT car_id, model, year, mileage, last_maintenance_date FROM CarData WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, cost FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE cost < 500;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT vehicle_id, analysis_type, prediction FROM PredictiveAnalysis ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT make, model, year, last_maintenance_date FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2018 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT make, year FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE cost > 1000 AND maintenance_type = 'major';
SELECT vehicle_id, sensor_type, reading, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE reading < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, analysis_type, prediction, confidence_level FROM PredictiveAnalysis WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction;
SELECT * FROM CarData ORDER BY brand ASC, year DESC;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM CarData WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT car_id, brand, mileage FROM CarData WHERE mileage < 50000 ORDER BY brand, mileage DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY reading DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM CarData;
SELECT car_id, brand, year FROM CarData WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT model, year, mileage FROM CarData WHERE mileage < 50000 ORDER BY mileage ASC;
SELECT car_id, brand, model, year FROM CarData WHERE brand LIKE 'To%' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs JOIN CarData ON MaintenanceLogs.car_id = CarData.car_id;
